resources.string: CREATE TABLE Card (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,hashKey TEXT, cardId TEXT, creationRecord TEXT, updateRecord TEXT, currentBalance REAL)
CREATE TABLE Compost (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, busId TEXT, cardId TEXT,record TEXT, amount REAL)
CREATE TABLE Config (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, busId TEXT, minimumAmountToCompost REAL,compostAmount REAL)
